verbs.description: i [V: 've] got lots of exciting book news to share i ’ve got lots of exciting book news to share i know i 've been working on it for a while now but i 'm still having to tell myself that i have in fact actually really written a book do n't get me wrong i 've experienced all the requisite stress and anxiety associated with writing a book but it was n't until today when my publisher sent over a pdf of the arc publisher rachel held evans barnes noble amazoncom unraptured jesus amazon barnes noble new york times herald press
